copy.title: Knitting
copy.instruction0: Click on the yarn balls to make a stitch.
copy.instruction1: Match the yarn color to the current square color in the pattern.
copy.instruction2: If you click the wrong color yarn ball, you will make a broken stitch.
copy.instruction3: Race to the STAR squares before they disappear.
copy.instruction4: Stitch a STAR square and the next few will auto stitch!
copy.bobbinEncourage1: This little spider sure purls fast!
copy.bobbinEncourage2: Knit, purl, keep the yarn going!
copy.bobbinEncourage4: You're doing a stitch-arific job so far!
copy.bobbinEncourage5: It takes real knit-wit to stitch so fast!
copy.bobbinDiscourage0: Darn! Oh wool, ya lost one!
copy.bobbinDiscourage1: Aw, ya knit some ya lose some!
copy.bobbinPoor0: That was a good try at knitting. I betcha you'll do better next time!
copy.bobbinPoor1: Not bad knitting for a beginner. Keep trying!
copy.bobbinPoor2: Just keep on knitting! I know you'll do it better next time!
copy.bobbinPoor3: All it takes is a little more practice, and you'll be knitting like a pro!
copy.bobbinGood0: Nice knitting! Have ya done this before?
copy.bobbinGood1: Hey-oh! Nice purling work there! I'm proud of ya!
copy.bobbinGood2: Well, my knitting needles, you're pretty good at purling!
copy.bobbinGood3: You're pretty good with this whole knit and purl thing, ya know that?

copy.bobbinGreat2: Stitch-a-ific! Ya sure know how to give a spider a workout!
copy.bobbinGreat3: Knit my slippers, that was some tailor-tastic wool work ya did there!
copy.bobbinAwesome0: Okay, I'm totally wowed. That was an amazing knit job!
copy.bobbinAwesome1: Ya might be the best knit-wit I've ever seen! Way to go!
copy.bobbinAwesome2: Hey-oh! Your knitting skills are totally flaptastic!
copy.bobbinAwesome3: Well, pleat my wings, that was some flashy purling!
copy.mendyEncourage0: That spider is terribly fond of wool.
copy.mendyEncourage1: Splendid! We're showing a real talent for this!
copy.mendyEncourage2: Our material will be beautifully knit in no time!
copy.mendyEncourage5: It requires skill to keep a spider stitching, doesn't it?
copy.mendyEncourage6: We're showing a distinct skill with a garter stitch!
copy.mendyDiscourage0: Careful now! Let's try it again.
copy.mendyDiscourage1: No worries, my dear, we have more wool!

copy.mendyGreat3: You've been practicing, haven't you? Great work!
